parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the calculated value of [[simple expression]] defined in config. Config could be any config entry, even [[missionConfigFile | mission config]] entry. It is more important that the vehicle is a transport and not any object. If the expression contains sound controllers, the controller values will be taken from the given vehicle. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''getSoundControllerResult''' config </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - transport vehicle</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> config: [[Config]] - path to config entry containing the expression</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_result = ([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[getSoundControllerResult]] ([[configFile]] [[gtgt|>>]] "cfgVehicles" [[gtgt|>>]] [[typeOf]] ([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[gtgt|>>]] "sounds" [[gtgt|>>]] "idle_ext" [[gtgt|>>]] "volume");</code></value></part><part><name>example1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>//-- mission config entry to reverse rain strength: <tt>myExpression = "rain factor [1,0]";</tt> 
_result = "PaperCar" [[createVehicleLocal]] [[position]] [[player]] [[getSoundControllerResult]] ([[missionConfigFile]] >> "myExpression");</code></value></part><part><name>example2</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3 Sound]], [[getSoundController]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]], [[getAllSoundControllers]], [[getCustomSoundController]], [[setCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]]   </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
